create.environment: Pick the blockchain you want to create an NFT on.
create.offline: To create an asset please configure your nodes!
create.account: Pick the account you want to create an NFT with.
create.images: Provide the images for your NFT

edit.environment: Pick the blockchain you want to edit an NFT on.
edit.offline: To edit an NFT please configure your nodes!
edit.account: Pick the account you want to edit an NFT with.
edit.asset: Select the asset you want to edit.

issue.environment: Pick the blockchain you want to issue an NFT on.
issue.offline: To issue an NFT please configure your nodes!
issue.account: Pick the account you want to issue an NFT with.

upgrade.environment: Pick the blockchain you want to upgrade your account on.
upgrade.offline: To upgrade your account please configure your nodes!
upgrade.account: Which account do you want to upgrade?

load.environment: Pick the blockchain you want to load an NFT draft for.
